Targets.Input: {"commands":["tag=$(aws ecr describe-images --repository-name bigimage --query 'sort_by(imageDetails,& imagePushedAt)[-1].imageTags[0]' --output text)","sudo ctr -n k8s.io images pull -u AWS:$(aws ecr get-login-password) 133129065110.dkr.ecr.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/bigimage:$tag"]}
